item.title: Switch 2 ‘Now You’re Playing Together’ commercial featuring Paul Rudd
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/switch-2-now-youre-playing-together-commercial-featuring-paul-rudd

  • Switch 2

A callback to a 1991 Super Nintendo Entertainment System commercial.

Nintendo has released a new commercial for Switch 2 dubbed “Now You’re Playing Together,” which features actor Paul Rudd and is a callback to a 1991 Super Nintendo Entertainment System commercial that also featured Rudd.

The company also uploaded the original Super Nintendo Entertainment commercial as a direct comparison.

Switch 2 is due out on June 5. Pre-orders will open in the United States and Canada on April 24.

Watch the commercials below.

“Now You’re Playing Together” featuring Paul Rudd

Super Nintendo Entertainment System Commercial featuring Paul Rudd

item.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows rated for Switch 2 in Europe
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/assassins-creed-shadows-rated-for-switch-2-in-europe

  • Switch 2

Currently available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PC, and Luna.

Pan European Game Information has rated a Switch 2 version of the recently released Assassin’s Creed Shadows.

The rating is currently only visible on the Pan European Game Information homepage, under the “Most Searched Games” section. The actual search page does not list the Switch 2 version yet.

Assassin’s Creed Shadows launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Ubisoft Store, Mac via App Store, and Luna on March 20.

Ubisoft has yet to announce a Switch 2 version of the game, but the company has already announced plans to support the system with the release of Star Wars Outlaws on September 4.
